title: Oriental unknown
content:
A friend of mine asked me to do a monogram like design with these oriental characters but I don’t even know which langauge are they in. Who can identify them? How can I pull them out of a font to know their actual typographic shape?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906122620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mazao_4536.jpg)

 [‹ Didot-esque?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906122620/http:/typophile.com/node/46133 "Go to previous forum topic") [TERA NOVA font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906122620/http:/typophile.com/node/46099 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:
Chinese, maybe? At least it’s not Japanese. The left is “正”. I don’t know of the right one, perhaps “維”?

You should ask Chinese people about it.
